main.name: Andrei Cosma
main.contactmessage: Contact me and let's have a talk!

resume.skillmessage:
Hello, i'm Andrei Cosma and i am a Full Stack Java Developer. 
I like to consider myself an open minded person and I'm easily inspired by positive change. 
I aspire to inspire and I enjoy getting the big picture, coupling business and organisational values together.
My life values and core principles are: action, determination and resilience.

education.description: By following the automatic and informatic profile, i achieved a basic understading of concepts about programming
Guided on how to achieve goals, i learned how to honor a commitement, both professionally and socially
